div.title: Specify different activities which is held in an institute.

OpenEduCat auto backup modules helps you to generate backups of your databases automatically on regular interval of times. The generated backups can be stored into local storage, FTP server, SFTP server, Dropbox, Google Drive or Onedrive.User can enable auto remove option to automatically delete old backups. User can enable email notification to be notified about the success and failure of the backup generation and storage. Using Automatic Database Backup module user can generate and store database backups to multiple location.

div.div: OpenEduCat auto-backup saves databases regularly to local or cloud storage.
This module allows to store generated backups on Dropbox.
This module allows to store generated backups to remote FTP server.
This module allows to store generated backups on Google Drive.
This module allows to store generated backups on Onedrive.
Stores backups on a secure remote SFTP server, similar to FTP, with added security.
